alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps, northwestern Kearney and southwestern Buffalo Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Odessa, or 7 miles west of Kearney, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kearney around 305 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 261 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
